title: Scorecard Definition
description: Schema for regis-cli scorecard definition files (YAML or JSON).

description.description: Human-readable description of what this scorecard evaluates.

slug.description: Short identifier used for HTML report filename generation.

links.description: Optional custom links to display as actions for this scorecard.

url.description: URL template which can use {metadata[key]} placeholders

pages.description: List of scorecard pages. Each page groups sections.

sections.description: List of scorecard sections. Each section groups rules, levels, and display preferences.

section.description: A scorecard section containing rules, optional levels, and display preferences.

levels.description: Priority/severity levels used to group rules. Built-in fallback order exists for bronze, silver, gold.

analyzers.description: List of analyzer names whose output should be embedded in this section.

widgets.description: KPI widgets displayed in the section header.

widget.description: A key-value widget displaying a metric from the analysis report.

value.description: Dot-separated path into the report data, e.g. 'results.trivy.critical_count'.

icon.description: Emoji or icon displayed alongside the widget.

level.description: A priority/severity level used to group and summarise rules.

order.description: Sort order (lower value = higher priority). Built-in defaults: bronze=1, silver=2, gold=3.

rule.description: An evaluation rule with a JsonLogic condition.

title.description: Human-readable title. Defaults to name if omitted.

level.description: Level this rule belongs to. Must match a level name defined in the section.

tags.description: Arbitrary tags for filtering or grouping.

condition.description: JsonLogic expression evaluated against the flattened analysis report. Variables use dot-paths, e.g. {"var": "results.trivy.critical_count"}. Supported operators: ==, !=, >, >=, <, <=, in, !, and, or.
